verses.text: Ix yalanxi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
¿B'aq'uinh wal ol eyactej he tzuntzan owaj in yaelal tik, tzeyak'an kus in k'ol yet' juntzanh he lolonel tik?
Ayexnhejoch eyalan chukal lolonel t'ayin. ¿Tom max ex q'uixwi eyalan t'ayin?
Q'uinaloc yel ay in mul chi', ¿tom tzeyab' syail yuj?
Tzeyik' wal chaanh he b'a t'ayin yuj in yaelal tik, tzeyalanoch t'a in sat to chuk in.
Palta comonoc snachajel eyuuj to ha Dios icha tik tzin utani. A' ix in ak'anem t'a yol jun yaal tik.
Scomon el wav, swalan icha tik: Swab' wal in chami, xin chi. Palta malaj mach stak'wi t'ayin. Tzin nib'ej ay mach tzin colani, palta malaj mach sb'oan yaj t'ayin.
Ha Dios ix makan yol in b'e, yic maxtzac yal in b'eyeq'ui. Ichato t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal tzin ek' yuj.
Ix yik'ek' in b'eyumal, ix yik'anek' sniwanil welk'ochi.
Ix in satem t'a junelnhej. Ha tas ayoch yipoc in k'ool, pilan ix lajwiel icha junok te te' malaj sch'anhal yib'.
Ix seccot yowal sk'ool t'a wib'anh, icha wal junok yajk'ool ix in yutej.
Masanil heb' soldado Dios chi' ix och oyan t'ayin. Ix oymaj heb' t'a spatictac in pat yic syak'an owal heb' wed'oc.
Ha Dios chi' ix ik'anel heb' wuk'tac yet' heb' wamigo t'a in tz'ey, ichaxonhej junok comon anima ix in yutejkan heb'.
Ha heb' ayto wuj in b'a yet'oc yet' heb' wamigo, ix in yaktejkan heb', ix in b'atkan satk'olal yuj heb'.
Axo heb' kajan t'a in pat yet' masanil heb' in chekab', icha junok ch'oc animail ix in ajkan t'a heb', maxtzac in yilochlaj heb'.
Tato swavtejcot junok heb' in chekab' chi', maxtzac tak'wilaj heb' t'ayin, wach'chom tzin tewi t'a heb'.
Ayic tzin k'och t'a stz'ey ix wetb'eyum, chuclaj sjab' xob'al in ti' syab' ix, haxo heb' ayto wuj in b'a yet'oc, tzin syajel heb'.
Icha pax chi' heb' unin tzin spatiquejel heb'. Ayic syilan heb' weq'ui sb'uchwaj heb' t'ayin.
Ha wal heb' ek'b'al te wach' wak'an yet'oc, tzin spatiquejel heb'. Ha wal heb' tzin te tzalaj yet'oc, ix meltzajoch heb' ajk'olal t'ayin.
Toxo ix tacjioch in tz'umal yet' in b'ak'chil t'a in b'aquil, tewelxonhej pitzan in.
Ex wamigo, ok'okab' he k'ool t'ayin, yujto ha Dios ix ak'ancot jun yaelal tik t'a wib'anh.
¿Tas yuj tzak'anexnhej wuuj, icha tzin yutej Dios? ¿Tom manh k'ocb'ilocxo in eyak'an cusoc?
Ayoc wal mach stz'ib'ankan juntzanh in lolonel tik. Comonoc tz'ak'chajkanoch t'a k'een k'een.
Comonoc a yet' k'een cincel nab'a hierro tz'ak'jikanoch t'a k'een k'een yic skan t'a junelnhej.
Vojtak to a in Kolumal pitzannhej, haxo t'a slajwub' k'ual ol emul t'a sat lum tik yic tzin scolani.
Wach'chom slajwiel in tz'umal tik, palta ol wil wal och Dios yet' in niwanil tik.
Ha in wal lak'an ol wil wal och yet' in sat, manh ch'ococ mach ol ilanoc. Vanxo slajwik'och wip swab'i.
Ayic swab'an eyalan icha tik: ¿Tas wal scutej kak'an kus sk'ol winh, yujto munil a winh tz'ik'ancot syaelal chi' t'a yib'anh? xe chi.
Palta xiwanhec t'a k'een espada, aton yowal sk'ol Dios syak'lab'ej t'a heb' sk'ulan chukal. Ojtaquejequeli to ay jun Dios tzonh ch'olb'itani, xchi winhaj Job chi'.
